item.title: Any one have the cases and send quests for the music
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

case 101: //normal (level 1)
		if(summonLevel >= 1)
{
		isNpc = false;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 1655: //North Wall  (level 1)
				if(summonLevel >= 1)
				{
				sendMessage("You build a north wall");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 2854, -1, 0); //North wall
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP(50);
}
				if(summonLevel < 1) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 77: // South Wall (level 5)
				if(summonLevel >= 5)
				{
				sendMessage("You make a South Wall");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 2854, -3, 0);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP(100);
}
				if(summonLevel < 5) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 749: //  West wall (level 10)
				if(summonLevel >= 10)
				{
				sendMessage("You build a west wall!");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 2854, 0, 0);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP(150);
}
				if(summonLevel < 10) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 92: // East Wall (level 20)
				if(summonLevel >= 20)
				{
				sendMessage("You build an east wall");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX ,absY ,2854 ,-2 ,0);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP(200);
}
				if(summonLevel < 20) {
				sendMessage("Build More!");
				}
break;

case 1693: // Dummy (level 30)
				if(summonLevel >= 30)
				{
				sendMessage("You make a dummy");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY-1, 823, 1, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP(350);
}
				if(summonLevel < 30) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 1241: // Bank (level 45)
				if(summonLevel >= 45)
				{
				sendMessage("You make a bank");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY-1, 2213, -1, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (500);
}
				if(summonLevel < 45) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 1265: //Magic lever  (level 60)
				if(summonLevel >= 60)
				{
				sendMessage("You make a magic lever");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 5959, 3, 4);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (700);
}
				if(summonLevel < 60) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 2803: // Flaming Altar (level 65)
				if(summonLevel >= 65)
				{
				sendMessage("You build a flaming altar");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY-1, 4090, 0, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (800);
}
				if(summonLevel < 65) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 2880: // phat rock (level 70)
				if(summonLevel >= 70)
				{
				sendMessage("You make a phat rock");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 2107, -2, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (900);
}
				if(summonLevel < 70) {
				sendMessage("Build");
				}
break;

case 2892: // Upward Staircase (level 80)
				if(summonLevel >= 80)
				{
				sendMessage("You make a upward staircase!");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 1738, -2, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (1000);
}
				if(summonLevel < 80) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 2885: // Downward Staircase (level 85)
				if(summonLevel >= 85)
				{
				sendMessage("You build a downward staircasee!");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 1740, -2, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (1000);
}
				if(summonLevel < 85) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 1246: // Wardrobe (level 90)
				if(summonLevel >= 90)
				{
				sendMessage("You build a wardrobe!");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY-1, 388, 0, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (1150);
}
				if(summonLevel < 90) {
				sendMessage("Build More!");
				}
break;

case 1172: // Fountain of heroes (level 100)
				if(summonLevel >= 100)
				{
				sendMessage("You build the fountain of heroes!");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY-1, 2638, 0, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (1200);
}
				if(summonLevel < 100) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 2740: // Floor Spikes (level 105)
				if(summonLevel >= 105)
				{
				sendMessage("You build floor spikes");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY-1, 3582, 0, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (1300);
}
				if(summonLevel < 105) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 1575: // Strange floor (level 120)
				if(summonLevel >= 120)
				{
				sendMessage("You build a strange floor");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 9294, 0, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (1400);
}
				if(summonLevel < 120) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 1645: // Lava trough (level 135)
				if(summonLevel >= 135)
				{
				sendMessage("You build a floor");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 3414, 0, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (1500);
}
				if(summonLevel < 135) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 2919: // God statues (level 150)
				if(summonLevel >= 150)
				{
				sendMessage("You build the god statues");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY+1, 2875, 0, 10);
				makeGlobalObject(absX-1, absY, 2874, 0, 10);
				makeGlobalObject(absX+1, absY, 2873, 0, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (2000);
}
				if(summonLevel < 150) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 509: // Open Door (level 165)
				if(summonLevel >= 165)
				{
				sendMessage("You build a door");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 1531, 0, 0);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (2100);
}
				if(summonLevel < 165) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 3497: // Altar (level 180)
				if(summonLevel >= 180)
				{
				sendMessage("you build an Altar");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY-1, 409, 0, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (2300);
}
				if(summonLevel < 180) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 3070: // Altar of Guthix (level 200)
				if(summonLevel >= 200)
				{
				sendMessage("You build an Altar of Guthix");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY-1, 410, 0, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (2500);
}
				if(summonLevel < 200) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 1590: // Chaos Altar (level 210)
				if(summonLevel >= 210)
				{
				sendMessage("You build a chaos altar");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY-1, 411, 0, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (2800);
}
				if(summonLevel < 210) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 1591: // Light door (level 225)
				if(summonLevel >= 225)
				{
				sendMessage("You build a light door");
				stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 9768, 0, 10);
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (2900);
}
				if(summonLevel < 2) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 1592: //Training Area (level 235)
				if(summonLevel >= 1)
				{
				sendMessage("Welcome back");
				stillgfx(574, absY, absX);
				teleportToX = 3252;
				teleportToY = 3434;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (0);
}
				if(summonLevel < 1) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;

case 3494: // invisible (level 250)
				if(summonLevel >= 1)
				{
				sendMessage("1,2,3 START BUILDING!");
				stillgfx(59, absY-1, absX);
				stillgfx(59, absY, absX+1);
				stillgfx(59, absY+1, absX);
				stillgfx(59, absY, absX-1);
				teleportToX = 3253;
				teleportToY = 2879;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				actionTimer = 20;
				addSummonXP (0);
}
				if(summonLevel < 1) {
				sendMessage("Build more!");
				}
break;
}
}
}

public void RefreshSummonBook() {

sendQuest("", 963);
sendQuest("", 8934);
sendQuest("", 6272);
sendQuest("", 6271);
sendQuest("", 9926);
sendQuest("", 1250);
sendQuest("", 1251);
sendQuest("", 704);
sendQuest("", 705);
sendQuest("", 701);
sendQuest("", 702);
sendQuest("", 712);
sendQuest("", 713);
sendQuest("", 936);
sendQuest("", 935);
sendQuest("Construction:", 5450);
sendQuest("", 4439);
//Start of music list lol
sendQuest("@yel@Construction Level: "+summonLevel, 3206);
sendQuest("@yel@Construction XP: "+summonXP, 5449);
if(summonLevel >= 1)
sendQuest("@gre@Only build in con area", 11941);
else
sendQuest("Type Only build in con area", 11941);
if(summonLevel >= 1)
sendQuest("@gre@North Wall (lvl 1)", 4287);
else
sendQuest("North Wall (lvl 1)", 4287);
if(summonLevel >= 5)
sendQuest("@gre@South Wall (lvl 5)", 4288);
else
sendQuest("South Wall (lvl 5)", 4288);
if(summonLevel >= 10)
sendQuest("@gre@West wall (lvl 10)", 4289);
else
sendQuest("West wall (lvl 10)", 4289);
if(summonLevel >= 20)
sendQuest("@gre@East Wall (lvl 20)", 4290);
else
sendQuest("East Wall (lvl 20)", 4290);
if(summonLevel >= 30)
sendQuest("@gre@Dummy (level 30)", 11134);
else
sendQuest("Dummy (level 30)", 11134);
if(summonLevel >= 45)
sendQuest("@gre@Bank (lvl 45)", 4291);
else
sendQuest("Bank (lvl 45)", 4291);
if(summonLevel >= 60)
sendQuest("@gre@Magic Lever (lvl 60)", 4292);
else
sendQuest("Magic Lever (lvl 60)", 4292);
if(summonLevel >= 65)
sendQuest("@gre@Flaming Altar (lvl 65)", 4293);
else
sendQuest("Flaming Altar (lvl 65)", 4293);
if(summonLevel >= 70)
sendQuest("@gre@Phat rock (lvl 70)", 4294);
else
sendQuest("Phat rock (lvl 70)", 4294);
if(summonLevel >= 80)
sendQuest("@gre@Upward Staircase (lvl 80)", 4295);
else
sendQuest("Upward Staircase (lvl 80)", 4295);
if(summonLevel >= 85)
sendQuest("@gre@Downward Staircase (lvl 85)", 4296);
else
sendQuest("Downward Staircase (lvl 85)", 4296);
if(summonLevel >= 90)
sendQuest("@gre@Wardrobe (lvl 90)", 8935);
else
sendQuest("Wardrobe (lvl 90)", 8935);
if(summonLevel >= 100)
sendQuest("@gre@Fountain of heroes (lvl 100)", 4297);
else
sendQuest("Fountain of heroes (lvl 100)", 4297);
if(summonLevel >= 105)
sendQuest("@gre@Floor spikes (lvl 105)", 4298);
else
sendQuest("Floor Spikes (lvl 105)", 4298);
if(summonLevel >= 120)
sendQuest("@gre@Strange floor (lvl 120)", 4299);
else
sendQuest("Strange floor (lvl 120)", 4299);
if(summonLevel >= 135)
sendQuest("@gre@Lava trough (lvl 135)", 4300);
else
sendQuest("Lava trough (lvl 135)", 4300);
if(summonLevel >= 150)
sendQuest("@gre@God statues (lvl 150)", 4301);
else
sendQuest("Gods= statues (lvl 150)", 4301);
if(summonLevel >= 165)
sendQuest("@gre@Open Door (lvl 165)", 4302);
else
sendQuest("Open Door (lvl 165)", 4302);
if(summonLevel >= 180)
sendQuest("@gre@Altar (lvl 180)", 4303);
else
sendQuest("Altar (lvl 180)", 4303);
if(summonLevel >= 200)
sendQuest("@gre@Guthix Altar (lvl 200)", 4304);
else
sendQuest("Guthix Altar (lvl 200)", 4304);
if(summonLevel >= 210)
sendQuest("@gre@Chaos Altar (lvl 210)", 14872);
else
sendQuest("Chaos Altar (lvl 210)", 14872);
if(summonLevel >= 225)
sendQuest("@gre@Light Door (lvl 225)", 664);
else
sendQuest("Light Door (lvl 225)", 664);
sendQuest("@gre@Training area (lvl 235)", 8971);
sendQuest("@gre@Construction Area", 4306);


sendQuest("@dbl@==================", 7454);
}
